name: A ROBOT with ARMS
description:
You are a robot with two arms which can be extended in order to solve physics-based puzzles.

This game was made in ~48 hours (in total) for a 2 weeks game jam.

There are a few easy puzzles where you will learn how to control the robot, and then 3 challenges! They are quite tricky, so get ready! Will you be able to finish them?!

I will be making a devblog showing how I made this game on my YouTube channel!
